QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: CIM_ElementStatisticalData is an association that relates a ManagedElement to its StatisticalData. Note that the cardinality of the ManagedElement reference is Min(1), Max(1). This cardinality mandates the instantiation of the ElementStatisticalData association for the referenced instance of CIM_StatisticalData. ElementStatisticalData describes the existence requirements and context for the CIM_StatisticalData, relative to a specific ManagedElement.

QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: The ManagedElement for which statistical or metric data is defined.
